thread.section_title: Pavillon Villiers Etoile - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First time in Paris
thread.title_full: First time in Paris - Review of Pavillon Villiers Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: heaven1880
title: First time in Paris
text: Had a wonderful 6 night stay at this hotel. It was so close to metro which is a big plus to get around the city. The Front desk staff are super friendly and accommodating, especially Joel! It was not a luxury hotel, so you get what you paid for. Small and outdated rooms but very clean. Highly recommend for a budget trip. Thank you Pavillon Villers, we would definitely stay again the next time we come back to Paris :)
